CoverageBenefitItem.name: CoverageBenefitItem
CoverageBenefitItem.description: Specific service covered by the insurance plan.

BenefitCategory.description: Name of the category this benefit is in.

CodeSetServiceTypeId.description: ID of a Code Set Service Type in the Code Set object.

CoverageBenefitId.description: The ID of the covered benefit this item belongs to.

CoverageLevel.description: Description of the level of coverage provided by this item.

DoesDeductibleApply.description: Specifies whether the benefit item requires a prior expenditure by the patient.

InNetworkCoverage.description: Description of the in network coverage provided by this item.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the benefit item is currently available.

IsInPlanNetwork.description: Indicates whether the benefit is available only in-network (true) or both in-network and out-of-network (false).

IsPreauthorizationRequired.description: Specifies whether the service must be approved before use.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MemberId.description: The ID of the member receiving this benefit item.

Name.description: Name of this coverage benefit item.

Notes.description: Additional information about this coverage benefit item.

OutofNetworkCoverage.description: Description of the coverage for non-preferred providers.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ServiceType.description: The type of service this plan benefit item provides.

ServiceTypeCode.description: The code for the type of service this plan benefit item provides.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this coverage benefits item record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the CoverageBenefitItem in its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this coverage benefits item was last changed on the source system.

TimePeriod.description: A description of the period this plan benefit item covers.
